props.close: Adds a close icon that can hide the alert.
props.color: Applies specified color to the control. Allowed values: `primary`, `error`, `warn`, `success`, `info`.
props.containerClass: Applies a custom class to `.alert__container`. _Has container for preventing opacity, can be removed when set not transparent background colors._
props.icon: Adds a info icon at beginning of alert.
props.maxWidth: Sets the maximum width for the component.
props.minWidth: Sets the minimum width for the component.
props.mode: Sets the transition mode. _Sets the transition origin on the element with [transform origin class](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/transform-origin) or own._
props.modelValue: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.
props.text: Text content of alert. used if not provided default slot.

emits.update:modelValue: Emitted when the model value updated.

slots.icon: Slot for icon at beginning of alert.
slots.close: Slot for icon used in **close** prop.
